stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  HILARIOUS
comments: Schweitzer gets through a lot of material quickly, so you need to put in your part of the effort. If you read the textbook before coming to class, his lectures make everything click in. Otherwise, he always posts detailed lecture notes so you can go over anything you missed, and failing that, attend his office hours. Very subtle but witty humor!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
stu_tags: CARING  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Lectures are hard because he goes really fast. Homework can be group work and drops one of the three midterms. If you\'re unsure with something, even if it is something small, GO TO HIS OFFICE HOUR! The only reason how I managed to get through this class is attending his office hours. He is willing to help and clarifies until you understand.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: 3 midterm exams with lowest exam dropped, some homework, and a final. He\'s an ok lecturer, but doesn\'t emphasize well what is going to be covered on exams. However, if you review and understand the problems in BOTH his notes and the homework, you should do well. Theres no textbook, leaving only the problems from lecture and the homework to study.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: No textbook was given for this class but I kinda wish there was for those times when the lecture material was confusing. There are not many examples in class which makes in harder and everything is mostly theoretical and not numerical. He dropped our lowest midterm grade and only counted 45 problems on the final. Teaches well if you stay focused.

comments: This guy knows every detail and will walk through it all on the board for you where other professors skip out. It can be boring at times, other times invaluable.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: He spoke very soft voice so need to sit in front for the class. His exams are like from his homework and his homework is not that bad. He does not teach that well, so need to self teach. But he is a very nice professor and would any problem difficulty that you have if you talk to him one to one.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Though the class said book was required, it was not. He has a slight accent. Homework can be tough at times. Study his lecture notes and you should be fine for the exams, which are quite fair in my opinion. He drops the lowest homework and exam (not including the final).

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  Gives good feedback (2)  Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Caring (1)  EXTRA CREDIT (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Challenging class for sure, but as long as you put the time in to sit down and go over his notes (he has really detailed notes) you will do well on his exams. That said, Schweitzer is very math-oriented. I would only recommend him to someone who has at least completed CALC II (1132Q).

comments: Impossible to read his hand writing and he doesnt speak English. He also doesnt use the book so it is impossible to learn it on your own. DONT TAKE IT!
